title: Of Love & Deception
description: Two years after escaping the duplicitous and sadistic Blake Sheldon, Daniella Kurtz' life is finally back on track. With a damn hot boyfriend, Cruz Canton, who showers her with kisses and gifts, she knew she was on the road to her happily ever after.During a whirlwind romance, Cruz introduces Daniella to his longtime friends, Meg and Falcon Landers. The foursome become best buddies, almost like family, until a bittersweet moment changes everything.Desperate to conceive a child, Cruz and Daniella turn to Meg and Falconâ€™s fertility clinic for help. Good news and happy moments are short lived when love, lies and jealousy mix with her past, and raise suspicion. Cruz withdraws emotionally and physically, leaving Daniella fearful, confused, and alone. Daniella seeks answers, but the deeper she digs, the darker the secrets. Deception, threats and devastation envelop her. Alone and fighting for the truth, and her life, she must confront the ultimate question: Whose child is she carrying? And will she live to find out? Expected Pulication Date: January 1, 2013
author: Melisa M. Hamling
